name: proxy-agent-platform
description: Personal productivity platform with AI proxy agents

scripts.start: concurrently "cd frontend && npm start" "cd agent && python -m uvicorn main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000"
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:agent
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:agent
scripts.install:agent: cd agent && python -m venv .venv && source .venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:db
scripts.setup:db: cd agent && python -m alembic upgrade head
scripts.db:upgrade: cd agent && python -m alembic upgrade head
scripts.production:build: npm run build && cd agent && pip install -r requirements.txt

author: Proxy Agent Platform Team
